extendedInfo.description: Instant legal eBooks on all your devices. Read Adobe DigitalEditions and Adobe DRM eBooks as well as standard PDF documentson your smartphone, tablet pc or desktop computer.Simple and fast management of all your eBooks in one place orplain vanilla reading: This free tradebit reader tool gives youfreedom and power for all your reading needs. Synchronizes yourbookmarks from PC to phone to tablet to the cloud, if you like!Easily import new eBooks and documents. Migrate when you need to.This app will lock you in by giving you the ultimate freedom foryour eBooks, PDFs, manuals, tutorials, reference books.Choose from over 400,000 commercial bestsellers or thousandsof free eBooks in 4 languages, manage your library on all devices, share your interests with your friendson facebook or twitter.

reviews.title: It doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It crashes every time I try to use it. I have un installed it
reviews.author: Pete Whitehead

reviews.title: Thoroughly annoying
reviews.comment: Glitch ridden, and slow, the interface refuses to correctly advance pages, preferring instead to cycle back and forth between pages regardless of swipe or tap.
reviews.author: Gregory Tremblay

reviews.title: Crashes Every Time
reviews.comment: Not able to open Adobe Digital Edition, crashes every time I try to use dropbox, uninstalling now.
reviews.author: Nikki Angeles Vista

reviews.title: A complete turkey
reviews.comment: Extremely unresponsive on my Galaxy Note 10.1, crashes continually.
reviews.author: Trevor Prendergast

reviews.title: Excellent....
reviews.comment: Although I read all the user comments below, this application worked for me. Very useful and operates Adobe Digital Editions.
reviews.author: Kalgi Shah

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The app crashes all the time.
reviews.author: Luke Girvin

reviews.title: Bad Paging, Settings Dont Stick
reviews.comment: Good dropbox access for loading ePub books. User Interface is crappy. Paging is a nightmare. Whether it will page, how many pages will turn and when it will happen are all unpredictable. Settings don`t stay set. You have to keep setting them over and over. Could be a great reader with these problems fixed.
reviews.author: C. A. Thorne

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Had to reinstall 3 times still kept crashing. Hope they fix it soon, as I need digital editions.
reviews.author: Andy townsend

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Not only doesn\'t work, but also corrupts the .acsm file.  Download Alkido and it works.  Tradebit almost gave me false impression that Android can\'t handle ebooks borrowed from public libraries.
reviews.author: Adrian Jang

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes everytime i try to open my dropbox. Will look for better.
reviews.author: Peter Mattock

reviews.title: Crashy
reviews.comment: Crashed every time I tried to connect it to dropbox
reviews.author: Eric Hansen

reviews.title: It crashes
reviews.comment: Handles really bad large pages
reviews.author: Elena Machin Garijo

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Too buggy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t let me open my ebooks!
reviews.comment: Motorola Xoom Can\'t see my purchased books unless I sign into their website and can\'t sign into their website because it WON\'T ACCEPT MY USERNAME AND PASSWORD THAT I AM CURRENTLY USING IN THEIR APPLICATION! Very frustrating. Uninstalling now...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stops on browser pdf link access
reviews.comment: Opens Adobe Digital Editions fine after activation but stops/crashes when accessing a pdf link in any browser. Furthermore, it breakes PDFs in a way that they become unreadable. I found a better reader supporting Adobe Digital Editions
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keep on moving
reviews.comment: This reader is not worth it! Mostof myebooks did not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shy
reviews.comment: It won\'t even open. -_- it says oh processor stoped blah blah blah
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Adobe Digital ed
reviews.comment: Stops sand crashes all the time, hope u fix this solon. I\'m on a n7, 4.2.2...
reviews.author: Lars Bylund

reviews.title: It\'s sucks
reviews.comment: Keeps crashing can\'t download my text book
reviews.author: erik ramos

reviews.title: Crashed right off the bat
reviews.comment: Installed,  tried to open 3 different books,  crashed each time.  Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Brian Collis
